LOGFONT.desc: A class representing the font and colour of a control.

Hwnd.desc: The hwnd of the control that is associated with this instance.

guiHwnd.desc: The hwnd of the parent window of the control associated with this instance.

HFONT.desc: The handle to the font associated with the control.

Height.desc: The height of the characters in the font. See link for details.

Width.desc: The average width of characters in the font. See link for details.

Escapement.desc: The angle between the text direction and the x-axis of the screen in 1/10 degree. See link for details.

Orientation.desc: The angle between the bottom of the charats and the x-axis of the screen in 1/10 degree.

Weight.desc: How bold the text is. See link for details.

Italic.desc: Whether or not the font is italic.

Underline.desc: Whether or not the font is drawn with a line underneath it.

StrikeOut.desc: Whether or not the font is drawn with a line through it.

CharSet.desc: The char set of the font. See the link for details.

OutPrecision.desc: How precisely the drawn characters most match the set font characteristics. See link for details.

ClipPrecision.desc: How characters that are partially outside the bounds of the font are handled. See link for details.

Quality.desc: The quality of the font. See link for details.

PitchAndFamily.desc: The two low-order bits specify the pitch of the font and the last four bits specify the family. See link for details.

Colour.desc: The colour of the controls text in RGB format as a hex string.

_Colour.desc: The colour of the controls text in BGR format.

FaceName.desc: The name of the font that was applied to the control. See the link for common fonts.

__GetColour.desc: Retrives the colour that the parent window would paint the text as returned by `WM_CTLCOLORSTATIC`.

__GetDC.desc: Retrives the DC handle of the associated control.

returns.desc: The DC handle of the associated control.

args.name: Hwnd
args.desc: The hwnd of the control that will be associated with this instance.

args.name: guiHwnd
args.desc: The hwnd of the parent window.

args.name: hDC
args.desc: The handle to the device context that will be released.

GetData.desc: Retrieves the font characteristics from the LOGFONT structure.

args.name: buff
args.desc: A buffer holding a LOGFONT struct.

GetDimensionsInPixels.desc: Returns the bounding box of a string when written using the current font and style.

args.name: str
args.desc: The string to calculate the bounding box of.

PixelHeight.desc: Returns the needed height in pixels of a string using the current font and style.

args.name: str
args.desc: The string to calculate the height of.

PixelWidth.desc: Returns the needed width in pixels of a string using the current font and style.

args.name: str
args.desc: The string to calculate the width of.

ToOptions.desc: Converts the font characteristics to a string that can be used in `Gui, Font`.

returns.desc: The font characteristics as an ahk font option string.

ToStr.desc: Converts the object to a string.

UpdateFont.desc: Retrieves the font from the control and the colour for the parent window.
